titles.title: To require the Administrator of General Services to convey to the city of Key West, Florida, each of 2 parcels of land of the Naval Air Station Key West in Key West, Florida, at such time as the parcel is reported to the Administrator as excess to the needs of the Department of the Navy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

bill.summary: 7/13/1994--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of General Services to convey to the city of Key West, Florida, two parcels of land of the Naval Air Station in Key West at such time as the parcels are reported to the Administrator as excess to the needs of the Navy.
